base.name: PT_Patrimoine
base.description: Editorial database for Portuguese heritage places — Lucas Lunes editorial pipeline

tables.name: Places
tables.description: Main table for heritage places in Portugal. Each record represents one place moving through the editorial pipeline.

fields.name: place_id
fields.description: Auto-generated unique identifier

fields.name: place_name
fields.description: Name of the heritage place as extracted from source

fields.name: source_url
fields.description: Original URL from the source (manual entry or future scraping)

fields.name: category
fields.description: Heritage category

fields.name: city
fields.description: City or town where the place is located

fields.name: district
fields.description: Portuguese district

fields.name: country
fields.description: Always 'PT' for this base

fields.name: raw_text
fields.description: Raw text content from source. Unmodified. No AI rewriting.

fields.name: source_image_urls
fields.description: Image URLs from the source page, one per line

fields.name: source_type
fields.description: How the place data was sourced

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current position in the editorial pipeline

fields.name: human_validated
fields.description: Whether the place has been validated by a human editor

fields.name: human_validator
fields.description: Name or identifier of the human who validated

fields.name: validation_notes
fields.description: Human editor notes during validation

fields.name: scraped_at
fields.description: Timestamp of initial scraping or manual entry

fields.name: research_dossier
fields.description: AI-generated historical research dossier (Markdown). NOT a narrative article.

fields.name: historical_sources
fields.description: URLs and references cited in the research dossier, one per line

fields.name: uncertainty_flags
fields.description: Facts or claims in the research that require human verification

fields.name: women_figures
fields.description: Women figures linked to the place, extracted during research

fields.name: religious_figures
fields.description: Religious figures and orders linked to the place

fields.name: researched_at
fields.description: Timestamp of research dossier generation

fields.name: research_validated_by
fields.description: Human who validated the research dossier

fields.name: research_validation_notes
fields.description: Corrections or notes from research validation

fields.name: article_markdown
fields.description: Full narrative article in Markdown, written in Lucas Lunes voice

fields.name: seo_title
fields.description: SEO title for the article (max 60 characters)

fields.name: slug
fields.description: URL-safe slug for the article

fields.name: meta_title
fields.description: Meta title tag content (max 60 characters)

fields.name: meta_description
fields.description: Meta description tag content (max 155 characters)

fields.name: ritual_opening
fields.description: Country-specific ritual opening line for the article

fields.name: drafted_at
fields.description: Timestamp of article draft generation

fields.name: article_validated_by
fields.description: Human who validated and corrected the article

fields.name: article_validation_notes
fields.description: Corrections and editorial notes from article validation

fields.name: generated_image
fields.description: AI-generated image (DALL·E)

fields.name: manual_image
fields.description: Manually created artistic image (Nanabana Pro override)

fields.name: image_prompt_used
fields.description: The prompt used to generate the DALL·E image

fields.name: alt_text
fields.description: SEO-friendly alt text for the image (max 125 chars)

fields.name: image_source
fields.description: Whether the final image is automated or manually overridden

fields.name: image_generated_at
fields.description: Timestamp of image generation

fields.name: image_validated_by
fields.description: Human who approved the image

fields.name: canonical_url
fields.description: URL of the published canonical article

fields.name: publication_platform
fields.description: Platform where the canonical article is published

fields.name: publication_date
fields.description: Scheduled or actual publication date

fields.name: published_at
fields.description: Actual timestamp when article went live

fields.name: social_copy_facebook
fields.description: Native Facebook post text (no link)

fields.name: social_copy_instagram
fields.description: Native Instagram caption with hashtags (no link)

fields.name: social_comment_link
fields.description: Comment text containing the article link, posted 1 hour after social post

fields.name: social_fb_post_id
fields.description: Facebook post ID for the delayed comment

fields.name: social_ig_media_id
fields.description: Instagram media ID for the delayed comment

fields.name: social_schedule_date
fields.description: Scheduled date for social publication

fields.name: social_published_at
fields.description: Actual timestamp of social publication

fields.name: lieu_majeur_score
fields.description: Composite editorial priority score (0–100)

fields.name: score_historical
fields.description: Historical importance sub-score (0–30)

fields.name: score_narrative
fields.description: Human & narrative density sub-score (0–25)

fields.name: score_lucas_potential
fields.description: Lucas Lunes narrative potential sub-score (0–25)

fields.name: score_seo
fields.description: SEO & catalog coherence sub-score (0–20)

fields.name: scoring_rationale
fields.description: Brief AI-generated explanation of the score

fields.name: score_human_override
fields.description: Optional human override of the lieu_majeur_score

fields.name: scored_at
fields.description: Timestamp of score calculation

fields.name: ritual_date
fields.description: Assigned date in the 48h ritual calendar

fields.name: ritual_selected
fields.description: Whether this place has been selected by the ritual scheduler

fields.name: ritual_selected_at
fields.description: When the ritual scheduler selected this place

fields.name: editorial_notes
fields.description: General editorial notes, human comments, flags

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Record creation timestamp

fields.name: last_modified
fields.description: Last modification timestamp

views.name: Ready to Publish
views.description: Fully approved articles ready for canonical publication

views.name: Ritual Calendar
views.description: Calendar view of the 48h publication rhythm

views.name: Lieu Majeur Ranking
views.description: All validated places ranked by score

views.name: By District
views.description: All places grouped by Portuguese district

views.name: Errors & Failures
views.description: Records in error states requiring attention

tables.name: Sources
tables.description: Registry of Portuguese heritage data sources for future scraping or manual sourcing

fields.name: source_id
fields.description: Auto-generated identifier

fields.name: source_name
fields.description: Name of the source website or reference

fields.name: source_base_url
fields.description: Base URL of the source

fields.name: source_type
fields.description: Type of source

fields.name: scraping_enabled
fields.description: Whether automated scraping is configured for this source

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Notes about the source, robots.txt compliance, rate limits

tables.name: Editorial_Calendar
tables.description: Tracks the 48h ritual publication schedule for Portugal

fields.name: calendar_id
fields.description: Auto-generated identifier

fields.name: ritual_date
fields.description: Publication date in the ritual calendar

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country for this slot (always PT in this base)

fields.name: assigned_place
fields.description: Link to the Places record assigned to this slot

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of this calendar slot

fields.name: human_override
fields.description: Whether a human overrode the automatic selection

fields.name: override_notes
fields.description: Notes explaining human override decision

notes.portugal_sourcing: Unlike Spain (arteviajero.com), Portugal does not yet have a primary scraping source. Places are entered manually or from curated sources. The Sources table tracks potential future scraping targets.
notes.timezone: All timestamps use Europe/Lisbon timezone (UTC+0/UTC+1 depending on DST)
notes.language: Portuguese category names are used for heritage types to maintain cultural accuracy
